articles.description: As she emerged from I'm A Celebrity, Ruthie Henshall discovered that what she had thought was a casual private chat with fellow 'camper' Shane Richie hadn't, in fact, been private at all.
articles.content:
Most of us will recognise the heart-sinking feeling that accompanies the realisation that you've put your foot right in it.
For stage star Ruthie Henshall, 53, it was compounded by a very public set… [+12570 chars]
